item.title: Download YouTube in batch
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Table of Content youtube-dl Homebrew - The missing package manager forÂ macOS How to navigate in terminal? Example: Using the youtube-dl command Conclusion TL;DR Useful options youtube-dl Sometime I have to download many YouTube videos or songs, if you are using mac or linux, youtube-dl would be a very handy and useful tool to get the job done. youtube-dl is a command-line interface application which the plain text environment may deter you to give a try, but once you can get used to it, you will find that using command-line application somehow are much easier than GUI (Graphical User Interface) application.
